item.title: 4 Family Members' Lives Taken for MONEY? | Amy & Ross Vilardi
item.description: Amy and Ross Vilardi were each charged with four counts of murder eight years after the bodies of Michael and Cathy Scott, Barbara Scott and Violet Taylor were found in a home on Refuge Road. Investigators said it was one of the most brutal crimes they’ve seen in Anderson County. What are your thoughts on this case?

media:content.media:description: Amy and Ross Vilardi were each charged with four counts of murder eight years after the bodies of Michael and Cathy Scott, Barbara Scott and Violet Taylor were found in a home on Refuge Road. Investigators said it was one of the most brutal crimes they’ve seen in Anderson County. What are your thoughts on this case?

item.title: She Hid Her Boyfriend in Her Garden for 4 Months!
item.description: How Chilling Journal Entries Helped Convict Her

item.title: An Unknown Number Terrorised Them for MONTHS
item.description: How would you react if you realised that the person who has been torturing you was your mum the whole time?

item.title: Her Friends Did It Because She Was Transgender!
item.description: In 2023, 16-year-old Brianna Ghey, a transgender girl from Warrington, England, was found fatally stabbed in a park. Two teenagers, both 15, were later convicted of her murder after evidence revealed they had planned the attack for weeks. The case sparked nationwide grief and discussions about online radicalization and hate toward transgender people. Both killers were sentenced to life detention. How can society better protect vulnerable teens from cruelty masked as peer influence?

item.title: More Notorious Than Bonnie And Clyde: The Dennehy Case
item.description: In 2013, Joanna Dennehy murdered three men in Cambridgeshire, England, stabbing them and dumping their bodies in ditches. She later attacked two more men who survived. Showing no remorse, Dennehy laughed during police interviews and claimed she killed for “fun.” Convicted of multiple murders, she received a rare whole-life order, ensuring she’ll never be released. What creates such a chilling absence of empathy in a human being?

item.title: Christa Pike Lured Slemmer To An Abandoned Steam Plant
item.description: In 1995, 18-year-old Christa Pike lured classmate Colleen Slemmer into the woods at a Tennessee job corps center, where she and an accomplice tortured and murdered her out of jealousy. Pike became the youngest woman sentenced to death in the U.S. She remains on death row after decades of appeals. The case revealed a chilling mix of obsession and violence. How does envy twist a young mind into such darkness?

item.title: The Troubled Case Of Ana Kriegel
item.description: In 2018, 14-year-old Ana Kriégel was lured to an abandoned house in County Kildare, Ireland, where she was assaulted and murdered by two 13-year-old boys. The crime shocked the nation for its brutality and the young ages involved. Both boys were convicted of murder, becoming Ireland’s youngest convicted killers. The case raised haunting questions about violence, peer pressure, and empathy in youth. What drives children to commit such unimaginable cruelty?

item.title: She Escaped & Called 911! *Turpin Family*
item.description: In 2018, police rescued 13 siblings from the Perris, California home of David and Louise Turpin, uncovering years of shocking abuse and neglect. The children were starved, chained, and denied education, hidden behind a façade of a normal family. Both parents received life sentences. The case exposed deep flaws in oversight systems meant to protect children. How did such horror go unnoticed for so long?

item.title: Her Fascination with Pregnancy Hid a Terrifying Truth.
item.description: In 2020, Taylor Parker from Texas murdered Reagan Hancock, a 21-year-old expectant mother, and cut out her unborn baby in a horrifying attempt to fake her own pregnancy. The baby later died. Parker had spent months deceiving friends and family with elaborate lies about being pregnant. Convicted of capital murder in 2022, she was sentenced to death. What drives someone to create such an elaborate and deadly deception for sympathy and attention?

item.title: They Did This to Her for "Fun" | Anita Cobby
item.description: They Did This to Her for "Fun" | Anita Cobby

item.title: She Planned Her Daughter's Abduction!
item.description: Shannon’s case was a staged abduction orchestrated by her own mother and an accomplice for financial gain, but she was found alive, leading to widespread shock and outrage in the UK. The whole case is shocking and absolutely baffling. What are you guys' thoughts? - Em x

item.title: They Found the Bodybags in Their Own SHED!
item.description: They Found the Bodybags in Their Own SHED!

item.title: The Tragic Case That Shook Australia To Its Core
item.description: Vincent Stanford was sentenced to life in prison without parole over the murder of 26-year-old Stephanie Scott in 2016. What are your thoughts on this case?

item.title: He Couldn’t Handle Divorce So He Did the Unthinkable
item.description: In December 2023, 34-year-old Tiffany Morrison was shot in the head by her husband, Christopher Morrison, while she was in the shower. He then dismembered her body, hiding the remains in garbage bags inside a shed on their property. In 2024, Christopher pleaded guilty to aggravated murder, tampering, and abuse of a corpse, receiving a life sentence with parole eligibility after 25 years. How can warning signs of deadly domestic violence be recognized before tragedy strikes?

item.title: One Woman's Courage Exposed His TWISTED Mind!
item.description: Today we delve into the chilling case of Anthony Allen Shore infamously known as the "Tourniquet Killer." Between 1986 and 1995, Shore terrorised the Houston, Texas area, brutally strangling his victims using a homemade tourniquet device. What are your thoughts on this highly disturbing case? - Em x

item.title: Tradition vs Freedom: The Shafilea Ahmed Case��
item.description: Tradition vs Freedom: The Shafilea Ahmed Case��

item.title: "I Know I'm Going to Prison AGAIN" *Damien Bendall*
item.description: In 2021, Damien Bendall murdered his pregnant partner Terri Harris, her two children, and a young friend in Killamarsh, Derbyshire. Already on probation for prior offenses, he used a hammer in the brutal attack before calmly confessing. Sentenced to a whole life order, he will never be released. The case exposed deep failures in the probation system meant to protect victims. How can authorities prevent known offenders from causing such unimaginable harm again?

item.title: She Was in a PUB As Her Daughter Gave Her Last Breath! - Sharon Goldie
item.description: In 2018, 13-year-old Robyn Goldie died at home in North Lanarkshire, Scotland, after suffering neglect and malnutrition. Her mother, Sharon Goldie, ignored her daughter’s pleas for help and failed to seek medical care as Robyn’s condition worsened. In 2020, Sharon admitted to culpable homicide and child neglect, receiving a prison sentence of six years. The case exposed heartbreaking failures in both parenting and social care systems. How many silent cries for help go unheard until it’s too late?

item.title: He Took LYING to the Next Level
item.description: "I am not great with blood." He lied without blinking which makes this case even more chilling. No remorse, nothing. Whata re your thoughts?
